import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from "react"; import emailjs from "@emailjs/browser"; const Contact = () => { const form = useRef(); const [errors, setErrors] = useState({}); const [isSubmitted, setIsSubmitted] = useState(false); const validateForm = () => { const formErrors = {}; const formElements = form.current.elements; if (!formElements.fullname.value) formErrors.fullname = true; if (!formElements.email.value) { formErrors.email = true; } else if ( !/^[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z]{2,}$/i.test(formElements.email.value) ) { formErrors.email = true; } if (!formElements.message.value) formErrors.message = true; return formErrors; }; const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const formErrors = validateForm(); if (Object.keys(formErrors).length === 0) { emailjs .sendForm( "service_p1t28bl", "template_d8gz4wo", form.current, "1PZksJuIMwlwXrdy4" ) .then( () => { console.log("SUCCESS!"); form.current.reset(); setErrors({}); setIsSubmitted(true); }, (error) => { console.log("FAILED...", error.text); } ); } else { setErrors(formErrors); setIsSubmitted(false); } }; return (

Contact Me for more info

Malabe, colombo

(076) 860-6434

thangarajahkajanan@gmail.com

Interested in Collaborating or Have Questions?

); }; export default Contact;
